summary: Puts an enchanting table in Breezehome.
descriptionHtml:
MrGrimm73\'s Breezehome Enchanting Table

----------------------------------------
Description:

This is a super simple mod that adds a WORKING miniature enchanting table to the GUEST 
bedroom of Breeze Home in Whiterun. NO, this does not give you breeze home...you still  
have to purchase it like the rest of us. But, the table will be there upon purchase...I  
think lol

I have mine totally furnished [breezehome], so if you do not, then there should be like 
a crate and some hay to the left...EITHER way, the miniature enchanting table should be 
on the dresser to the right as soon as you walk in the guest bedroom.

----------------------------------------

INSTALL:

Unzip the file. Put the \"Data\" folder in your root Skyrim directory (Where TESV.exe  
resides). If asked to merge the Data folder with Data folder say yes. This is  
really basic stuff. In Fact if you want, just drag the .esp to where it belongs. 

If you can\'t figure out how to install this file or follow the directions on how to, you  
should not be here anyways lol :P

---------------------------------------

Uninstall:

Delete the file...duh...


lol

---------------------------------------

Random:

If you looked at all the screen shots and asked yourself, \"What is that super awesome  
outfit?!?!?!?!?!\", Here is the link to it:

FIRST you must install the base file here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008

THEN the re-tex version here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23626

since the outfit made it into a screen shot or two, I figured I’d plug the outfit since I  
really really like it.

---------------------------------------

ISSUE:
ONE small weird thing, since it is lower and smaller than usual enchanting tables, when  
your character leans over it there is a gap between their hands and the table. IF I feel  
like fixing it I will, but don’t hold your breath...then again, it kind of bothers me...idk...
maybe I will fix it... If YOU would like to fix it and re-upload it, feel free to do so. All I ask is you give credit where it is due. I made this mod for myself and only uploaded it because I am positive there\'s at least 1 other skyrim playing human being in the world that wants an enchanting table in their Whiterun house.


...unless there\'s not...then ... uh... tomatoes.
author: Mrgrimm73
